points: View information about application and the company.
helpData.jumbotronBody: This section shows detailed information about the application in terms of its identity. Moreover, you can get the details of the company that owns this application. These data will assist for all future correspondence, which might require differentiating this application from others.

helpData.note: You can use announcements to notify your customers about new offers, current topics and trends.
points: You can schedule an announcement by setting a date-time.
You can restrict announcements to one or more pages.
helpData.jumbotronBody: Use this section to broadcast information to your customers on any page of the website. Customize the text, its colour and background, for the announcement. Moreover, you can select the platforms on which the announcement would appear; such as Android, iOS or Web.

helpData.note: Use Application ID and Token to authorize the use of APIs and SDKs
points: API stands for Application Programming Interface
SDK stands for Software Development Kit
helpData.jumbotronBody: Use this section to utilize platform APIs and SDKs that allow you to create systems and develop applications. Avail platform APIs to get data related to your e-commerce business. Moreover, you also get reusable SDK methods that support different programming languages.

points: Enter the application details (e.g. name of sales channel) that will be used in the meta fields i.e. title and description of all your web pages.
These details will be used by default unless you specify custom SEO fields for your web pages.
